sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

class Form extends React.Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <form className="form">
        <label htmlFor="name">
          Nome
          <input
            data-testid="name-input"
            id="name"
            name="name"
            type="text"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="description">
          Descrição
          <textarea
            data-testid="description-input"
            id="description"
            name="description"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="attr1">
          Peso kg
          <input
            data-testid="attr1-input"
            id="attr1"
            name="attr1"
            type="number"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="attr2">
          Potência vocal 1-100
          <input
            data-testid="attr2-input"
            id="attr2"
            name="attr2"
            type="number"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="attr3">
          Fama 1-100
          <input
            data-testid="attr3-input"
            id="attr3"
            name="attr3"
            type="number"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="attr4">
          Grammy Awards
          <input
            data-testid="attr4-input"
            id="attr4"
            name="attr4"
            type="number"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="attr5">
          Clipes com mais de 1 bilhão de views
          <input
            data-testid="attr5-input"
            id="attr5"
            name="attr5"
            type="number"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="imageUrl">
          Ano de nascimento
          <input
            data-testid="image-input"
            id="imageUrl"
            name="imageUrl"
            type="text"
          />
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="select">
          Raridade
          <select data-testid="rare-input" id="select" name="select">
            <option value="normal">normal</option>
            <option value="raro">raro</option>
            <option value="muito raro">muito raro</option>
          </select>
        </label>

        <label htmlFor="trunfo">
          <input data-testid="trunfo-input" type="checkbox" id="trunfo" name="trunfo" />
          Super Trunfo
        </label>

        <button data-testid="save-button" type="button">Salvar</button>
      </form>
    );
  }
}

export default Form;
